channel.title: Kicksecure 17.2.8.0 - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Download
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Download
([What is a point release?](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Point_Release))
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, an in-place release upgrade is possible using the [Kicksecure repository](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
----
# Major Changes
* grub-live: * fix live-mode * msgcollector: * fix systemd unit exit code handling * swap-file-creator: * check if folder of swapfile exists * add sanity tests to check if swap file is readable/writeable * fix live mode detection * increase verbosity * fix: detach mapper only if swap was on * usability-misc: * Kicksecure and Whonix VirtualBox Linux Installer: adjusted for new ova image file names now including `Intel_AMD64` * derivatie-maker: * improve dry-run
----
# Full difference of all changes
[https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.7.8-developers-only...17.2.8.0-developers-only](https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.7.8-developers-only...17.2.8.0-developers-only)

item.title: Kicksecure 17.2.8.0 - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Download

Kicksecure – 6 Sep 24

Download Kicksecure (FREE)

FREE Download Kicksecure. Kicksecure can be installed on a physical machine as a host operating system (OS), as a guest OS inside a virtual machine, or as a portable host OS on a USB data stick.

(What is a point release?)

Upgrade

Alternatively, an in-place release upgrade is possible using the Kicksecure repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 10 Oct 24

Donating to Kicksecure

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Kicksecure – 15 Aug 24

Contribute to Kicksecure

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Major Changes

  • grub-live:
    • fix live-mode
  • msgcollector:
    • fix systemd unit exit code handling
  • swap-file-creator:
    • check if folder of swapfile exists
    • add sanity tests to check if swap file is readable/writeable
    • fix live mode detection
    • increase verbosity
    • fix: detach mapper only if swap was on
  • usability-misc:
    • Kicksecure and Whonix VirtualBox Linux Installer: adjusted for new ova image file names now including Intel_AMD64
  • derivatie-maker:
    • improve dry-run

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.2.7.8-developers-only…17.2.8.0-developers-only

Read full topic
